title: 4/13/17 - President Trump's big reversals...The Maple Family and Jack Barsky Join Glenn
description:
The rapid evolution of a president? ...Are President Trump's reversals good? ...Governments coming after our kids...CPS took a 7 year old child with ADHD from his parents. Glenn talks to the parents ...When schools overstep their boundaries ...Former KGB spy Jack Barsky stops by to discuss his book "Deep Cover" ...The incredible life of a Russian spy.

The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck, Pat Gray, Stu Burguiere and Jeff Fisher, Weekdays 9a–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio

Facebook: Glenn BeckTwitter: @glennbeck
